author: konmaorg
title: LawFinDAO :) - $LAWL
description: A key challenge for many proposed projects is the implementation of legal and financial frameworks. This stalls the project from moving forward and the new proposers have no support system in place.

author: shirah
title: Web3 Legal Hub
description: Projects can’t find adequate legal support because not enough lawyers trained to support Web3, and Web3-friendly lawyers are difficult to locate.

author: migamake
title: StablePay - replace StableCoins
description: Most contractual payments stay denominated in fiat currencies. We need a payment solution denominating payments in fiat, but without financial risks of StableCoins.

author: jhonatann
title: legal implementation in COLOMBIA
description: The legal difficulties that companies related to cryptocurrencies have in Colombia

author: nemesis916
title: Digital Voter ID
description: Citizens of the world face wide scale voter fraud on a level we have never seen before. This issue stems from the fact that people are forced to trust, instead of verify, when sending in a ballot.

author: oliverross
title: Legal & Accounting Marketplace
description: It's hard to know what we can / cannot do legally speaking with projects. Its hard to find domain expert legal or accounting professionals to assist with this process, which create a barrier to entry.

author: yogo
title: Accounting Reporting France
description: As a full-time Cardano/Catalyst, facing a major challenge in declaring income and managing the reporting process with multi-project engagement.

author: cargofe2
title: Legal Compliance Support (EN/ES)
description: Proponents need a compliance strategy to have procedures and best practices in place to identify and classify the operational and legal risks they face and establish internal mechanisms to prevent.

author: fnyethcatalyst1
title: Financial Implementation Blockchain
description: Indonesians are not yet aware of the existence of Blockchain function which can be very helpful for the business process for efficiency and cost reduction. Education and apps will be very helpful.

author: michiel
title: AI lawyer on Cardano - Profila/HSLU
description: Your offline/online personal & business life is governed by laws & contracts you have to accept but don't understand, which have real consequences. Today, you lack access to legal knowledge/lawyers.

author: michiel
title: Cardano Lawyer (EU-region)
description: Many of the activities and novel products by proposers on Cardano/Catalyst fall under existing regulations. It is not easy for startups to access this knowledge or expertise + costly.

author: mplomin
title: Mehen: USDM State Regulatory Fees
description: Cardano needs a fiat-backed stable coin that can be directly converted into fiat 1:1 as an alternative to algorithmic stable coins, and to support those who prefer or need a direct-to-fiat bridge.

author: rabbitholepools
title: Creation of a registered company
description: The legal and fiscal framework of funded Catalyst projects is sometimes challenging in local jurisdictions. This exposes project owners (and perspective clients) to potentially damaging risk.

author: joseiadicicco
title: Fundraising solutions in Argentina
description: Many projects that raise large sums of funding require various channels to legally use the funds in Argentina

author: rffx
title: Tanzania Cardano Think Tank
description: Lack of legal support to Funded proposals and Cardano ecosystem in Tanzania.

author: projectnewm
title: Digital Identity Integration
description: Disputes might arise among artist in reference to intellectual honesty. There must be a connection between real world identity and wallet addresses for effective legal recourse.

author: cerpofficial
title: Cardano ERP for Catalyst
description: There is currently no intelligent, open-source Cardano-native accounting/auditing system.

author: wada
title: Scale-UP Hubs' Legal Framework
description: Startups often have difficulty ensuring they are doing everything necessary to stay legally and financially organized.

author: dynamicstrategiesio
title: Blueprint for Investment Funds
description: Managing money for others without a special license is illegal in many jurisdictions. A legal structure is needed to avoid fines and create conditions for conflict resolution

author: nvhieu
title: Automated funding 4 funded projects
description: Funded projects currently lack the tools to support financial Implementations. Each project has a different tool and executes in a different way. These tools are often used manually by project manager

author: glaxas
title: Treasury Guild Advisory Service
description: Funded proposers have difficulty managing their budgets effectively and documenting their transactions transparently. There is no project management support available. This impacts proposal delivery.

author: sandovalex
title: Smart contract enabled fiat-on-ramp
description: Currently anyone who wants to use smart contracts on Cardano must own some ADA in order to interact with it. This creates an enormous barrier which stops many users from using a dapp.

author: projectnewm
title: KYC Solution
description: If an artist isn't registered with a performance rights organization/we cant identify the identity of said artists, there is no way to confirm ownership over the Intellectual property rights.

author: javiersv
title: Cardano4Charities
description: Every day, more financial power is transferred from the traditional fiat rails into the cryptoverse. Currently, many use-cases for money are not available for crypto users, e.g. donations to NGOs.

author: saqib
title: Documenting Human Rights Evidence
description: The documentary evidence of the genocidal human rights crimes against the Rohingya are at risk of being lost or destroyed.

author: jeancaguilar1
title: Cardano-Crystal Legal Operations
description: In Venezuela there is an entity that regulates the activities to operate in a Blockchain, through registration and licensing, these are necessary to promote the massive adoption of the Cardano network

author: algaetoken
title: Legal and Financial Standards
description: There is insufficient legal direction for aspiring decentralised, globally distributed sustainable business' models on the Cardano blockchain.

author: jx
title: On-chain reputation
description: “Social media influencers are routinely paid by scammers to help them pump and dump new tokens on the back of pure speculation”

author: cargofe2
title: LATAM Legal and Regulatory MindMap
description: There is no practical tool containing the legal and regulatory framework by country to provide clarity for non-lawyer users.

author: npaquoc87
title: Legal & Financial Consulting Hub
description: Currently Funded Proposals need the advise about the legal and finance & accounting. However, there is lacking of financial and legal experts who have knowledge and practical experience on blockchain.

author: nmkr
title: Structuring Employee Token Options
description: Offering Employee's Company tokens as an incentive tool can cause high tax costs on the employees & the company's side – there is no optimal distribution solution in the market yet.

author: nmkr
title: Connecting KYC to Tokens
description: KYC verifications can slow down our business activities

author: ngwari
title: For Cardano, Accountants & Lawyersl
description: PA 4% growth in accounting demand is expected by 2030, a surge in the global shrinkage of accountants and lawyers, and the Cardano community will struggle to grow.

author: elraulito
title: FluidTokens legal entity
description: FluidTokens aims to become a legally registered DAO for the users benefit, establishing itself as a legal entity in Switzerland. The fixed cost is 30.000$ plus additional annual costs

author: yogo
title: Onboarded companies playbook
description: New funded companies, face accounting and community communication challenges to be aligned with their normal operation. Catalyst does not have an available/ relevant source of information about it.

author: peterbisma
title: African Journalists - AJEOT 2022
description: How do we build competent journalists in sub-saharan Africa to influence policy debate and set the right tone for blockchain discourse and policy adoption?

author: nickyjacob
title: Legal Listings
description: Finding people who have legal and compliance knowledge is costly and inaccessible for new developers and entrepreneurs.

author: littlefish.foundation
title: littlefish - Law and the New Order
description: Legal frameworks around blockchain are changing everyday, it is difficult for Catalyst earners and organizations like the Littlefish Foundation to know what obligations they are under.

author: loxeinc
title: Catalyst Mediation Treasury
description: Catalyst has recently faced many conflict situations between community members that were not handled in a good way nor with professional guidance to transform conflict into a positive outcome.

author: robbedoya9
title: Assembly of TriState/National SPAC
description: There are good Legislators & Elected Officials that lack proper info, teams, & leadership to create a proper bill that wont stifle us. Then some "legislators" want to stifle and destroy our industry.

author: loxeinc
title: Mediation Training & Certification
description: Conflicts within the Cardano community are at large inadequately addressed due to a lack of blockchain-adept dispute resolution specialists.

author: jpg.store
title: JPG DAO: Legal Review
description: Across the crypto ecosystem and within Cardano exist a lot of tokens that can be construed as securities under the North-American and European laws raising issues of legitimacy and legality.

author: scinstitute
title: Imani Web3 Legal Services Portal
description: Legal services for the Web3 Crypto Blockchain space are difficult to navigate. The greatest challenges are determining what services are needed, where to obtain said services, and providers to trust.

author: fatmanuronarir
title: Instant Financial Data Application
description:
There are 2 main issues we can try to solve.

Gold, dollar, euro investors are not willing to invest in Cardan
Investors cannot calculate their instant profits and losses correctly or easily.

author: dlt360team
title: DLT360: Securities Law & Tokens
description: Token issuance is fundamental for most blockchain projects, communities & companies. However, securities regulation around the world is about to create sweeping obligations, which must be mapped

author: quasar
title: Global Compliance 200+ Jurisdiction
description: Project Catalyst is the largest global digital nation state in history and must address the global legal & financial regulations to have peace of mind and confidence in Catalyst.

author: nebiyus
title: Legal Consultancy in Ethiopia
description: Government offices in Ethiopia are currently releasing statements on the use of crypto without any legal basis. These statements are pushing and scaring people away from the adoption of crypto.
